Bash(gh pr create --title "Add asset metadata generation and integration docs" --body "$(cat <<''EOF''
## Summary

- **AI-generated asset metadata**: The extraction pipeline now generates compelling `asset.title` and `asset.description` fields for importing PDFs into external systems
- **Webhook callbacks**: Added `callbackUrl` option for async notification when extraction completes
- **Integration documentation**: Created `INTEGRATION.md` with internal team guide for core app integration

## Changes

### New Features
- `asset.title`: AI-generated title in format "[Company]: [Key Achievement]"
- `asset.description`: AI-generated description under 200 chars
- `callbackUrl` option: POST results to specified URL on completion

### Documentation
- `INTEGRATION.md`: Complete internal integration guide
- Updated `README.md` with new response fields

## Test plan
- [ ] Deploy to Render (auto-deploy on merge)
- [ ] Test extraction with Grammarly URL to verify `asset` field in response
- [ ] Verify PDF generation still works
